message: Feeling guilty and sad, I stroke Ren's tiny back.
He's worried about me. I know that. He's been with me every step of the way, so he understands me better than just about anyone.
Ren means so much to me. I don't know where my parents are, so he's the only family I have besides Granny.
I still remember when I first met him. It was...
Umm...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, remind me. When did we meet again?"

name: 蓮
message: "Do you mean when you purchased me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: 蓮
message: "If we count from the moment I initially registered your face, that would make it about ten years ago."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh, has it really only been ten years? For some reason, I feel like I've known you way longer."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But I guess ten years is a pretty long time..."

name: 蓮
message: "Yes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I remember thinking you were so big and fluffy the first time I held you. You seem so tiny now, though."

name: 蓮
message: "I imagine that's because you've grown, Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good point. Though you're still as fluffy as ever. I guess we're kinda like brothers, huh? I'm the big brother now, though."

name: 蓮
message: "I'm not sure I agree."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I thought you'd say that."
I keep stroking Ren's back as I smile.
I feel very close to him in this moment. I hope he can feel it too.
A yawn breaks free of my throat. Now that I've decided my course, it's like all the day's exhaustion has caught up with me.
I need to rest.
But first...
I lean back into the couch and open my Coil.
Though I know they won't get through, I want to write messages to everyone back home―kinda like throwing a bottle into the ocean.
I just hope they'll be okay...
